name: typegpu-monorepo
description: A thin layer between JS and WebGPU/WGSL that improves development experience and allows for faster iteration.

scripts.dev: DEV=true EXPERIMENTAL=true pnpm -r dev:build && DEV=true EXPERIMENTAL=true pnpm --parallel -r dev:watch
scripts.test: DEV=true EXPERIMENTAL=true pnpm -r dev:build && pnpm run '/^test:.*/'
scripts.nightly-build: EXPERIMENTAL=true pnpm -r dev:build && cd packages/typegpu && EXPERIMENTAL=true pnpm prepare-package
